name: GooEasy (7 days)
description:
[ This game was built in a week for the UntitledGameStudio Gamejam ]

Link to team page:  https://untitledteamslime.itch.io/gooeasy

Click the title in the menu ;)

Controls : 

  • W and A or Arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump
  • R to restart level

Team of 8:

Programmers:

  • Nathan James Anderson
  • Jack Eatock
  • Rares Morosan (Astro)

Audio:

  • Jack Jefferies (Jarf)
  • Rhys Lampard (Fusia)

Art:

  • Elaine Zeng (Ast)
  • Isabelle Stuetz
